function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in public social expenditures","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious diseases due to limited access to healthcare and education","Mitigation":"Increase public funding for healthcare and education, implement social safety nets","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure, educational platforms","People":"Underprivileged populations, low-income earners","Owner":"Government, policymakers"},{"Description":"Rising inequality and falling labor shares of income","Impact":"Higher prevalence of contagious diseases in marginalized communities, reduced access to healthcare","Mitigation":"Implement progressive tax policies, invest in healthcare infrastructure, promote labor rights","Technologies":"Data analytics for targeted interventions, healthcare technology for marginalized communities","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income earners","Owner":"Government, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Privatization of essential natural monopolies","Impact":"Reduced access to essential services (e.g., electricity, healthcare) for low-income individuals","Mitigation":"Regulation of essential services, public investment in infrastructure","Technologies":"Regulatory technology for monitoring, public infrastructure development","People":"Low-income communities, consumers of essential services","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, government"}]}
